title: Highest Net ODA Received
description: In 2022, Lebanon received net official development assistance (ODA) amounting to 554.48% of its gross capital formation, the highest percentage globally.

title: Lowest Gross Capital Formation Growth
description: Lebanon experienced a dramatic decline in gross capital formation with an annual growth rate of -95.58% in 2022, the lowest in the world.

title: Lowest Gross Savings
description: In 2022, Lebanon's gross savings were -21.01% of GDP, marking the lowest savings rate globally.
